column5: Went out to Hamilton Harbor last Friday night for an over nighter with a buddy of mine. Fishing was slow with only one run to show for, and even that fish he lost right at the shore. On the way home stopped by the place that Dan suggested and i was rewarded with the biggest fish this year. I did not measure it or weighed so i have no idea how much it weighed.
Have not seen too many reports with carp being posted .  Its about time you posted and caught a fish Marko
Biggest of the year so far eh  I'm sure you'll get one bigger very soon.
